name: 亚历山大·汉密尔顿
bio: 美国首任财政部长，联邦党创始人之一。建立国家银行、联邦税收体系和信用制度，奠定美国金融体系基础。在与伯尔的决斗中身亡，年仅49岁。
bio_en: First Secretary of the Treasury and chief architect of the American financial system. Born in the Caribbean, he rose to become Washington's aide-de-camp during the Revolution. He established the national bank, federal credit system, and the U.S. Mint. Co-authored The Federalist Papers defending the Constitution. Killed in a duel with Aaron Burr in 1804.
